channel.title: salad on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in salad on Recipes

item.title: Coleslaw
item.description: Ingredients 3/4 medium Green cabbage 1/4 medium Red cabbage 3 Carrots 1/2 cup (115g) mayonnaise 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard 1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar 1 tablespoon honey salt to taste pepper to taste Directions Cut the cabbage into quarters, then cut out the core. Cut each quarter crosswise and shred thinly as you like. Repeat same process with the red cabbage. Place shredded cabbage into a large bowl. Shred the carrots and add to the bowl.

item.title: Kale_apple_salad
item.description: Ingredients 5 cups chopped kale 2 small diced apples 1/4 cup cranberries, dried 1/4 cup chopped pecans 1/4 cup feta cheese Dressing: 4 tbsp honey 4 tbsp olive oil 2 tbsp apple cider vinegar 1/8 tsp salt 1/8 tsp pepper Directions Before you begin, massage the kale leaves if you want them softer. Place the kale in the bottom of a bowl followed by the rest of the ingredients. Whisk together the dressing ingredients and pour them over the top of the salad.

item.title: Kale_cashew_salad
item.description: Ingredients 250 g kale leaves 1/4 cup cashew nuts 1/4 cup golden yellow raisins 1/4 cup dried cranberries Sauce: 2 tbsp belsamic vinegar 2 tbsp olive oil 1 tbsp lemon juice or calamansi Pinch of salt (optional) Directions Wash kale leaves thoroughly. Prepare 2 cups of water and dissolve 1 tsp of salt. Soak the kale leaves into the water mixture for about 30 min to sterilize the kale leaves.
